mdRecord.dcterms:title: Syringe in cardboard box
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: East Rutherford Syringes, Inc. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The red and cream box is marked "One 20 CC. ideal metal tip luer slip hypodermic syringe, resistance glass, East Rutherford Syringes, Inc. East Rutherford, N.J." The syringe is a 20 CC syringe with gradations on the side and also the number 8898.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Syringes
